metadata.title: Sax Sheet
metadata.description: A place where you can find sheets for saxophone

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, The page you are looking for does not exist

heroSection.title: Saxophone Sheet Music
heroSection.description: Access, download, and contribute to our growing collection of saxophone sheet music.

featuresSection.title: Everything You Need
featuresSection.description: Our platform provides all the tools and resources for saxophone players of all levels.

search.title: Search
search.description: Easily find the sheet music you need.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.description: Save your favorite sheets for quick access.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: Share your own sheet music with the community.

multipleGenres.title: Multiple Genres
multipleGenres.description: From jazz to pop, find sheet music across various musical genres.

freeDownloads.title: Free Downloads
freeDownloads.description: Download for free any sheet music in PDF and audio track in MP3.

openSourceSection.title: Community-Driven Project
openSourceSection.description: Sax Sheet is an open source project, meaning anyone can contribute, improve, and help grow our collection.

ctaSection.title: Start Playing Today
ctaSection.description: Join thousands of saxophone players who use our free sheet music library.
